languages.text: "Стремления Инцендии Чорда понятны мне, но то, как она воплощает их... мне сложно найти оправдание для насилия над теми, кто должен полагаться на защиту праведных".

"Incendia Chorda's aspirations make sense to me, but the way she realises them... I struggle to find justification for violence against people who ought to be able to look to the righteous for protection."
languages.original_text: "Стремления Инцендии Чорда понятны мне, но то, как она воплощает их... мне сложно найти оправдание для насилия над теми, кто должен полагаться на защиту праведных".

traits.locale_text: "Incendia Chorda's aspirations make sense to me, but the way she realises them... I struggle to find justification for violence against people who ought to be able to look to the righteous for protection."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Incendia Chorda's aspirations make sense to me, but the way she realises them... I struggle to find justification for violence against people who ought to be able to look to the righteous for protection."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “对我而言，因森蒂娅·库尔达的愿望是合理的，但她实现愿望的方式……我很难找到理由，为那些寻求正义庇护之人遭受的暴行开脱。”
languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda's aspirations make sense to me, but the way she realises them... I struggle to find justification for violence against people who ought to be able to look to the righteous for protection."

traits.locale_text: “对我而言，因森蒂娅·库尔达的愿望是合理的，但她实现愿望的方式……我很难找到理由，为那些寻求正义庇护之人遭受的暴行开脱。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Les aspirations d'Incendia Chorda ne sont pas dénuées de sens, mais je ne peux pas en dire autant de sa manière de les atteindre... Je ne vois pas comment je pourrais justifier l'usage d'une telle violence contre ceux qui devraient pouvoir compter sur les justes pour les protéger. »
languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda's aspirations make sense to me, but the way she realises them... I struggle to find justification for violence against people who ought to be able to look to the righteous for protection."

traits.locale_text: « Les aspirations d'Incendia Chorda ne sont pas dénuées de sens, mais je ne peux pas en dire autant de sa manière de les atteindre... Je ne vois pas comment je pourrais justifier l'usage d'une telle violence contre ceux qui devraient pouvoir compter sur les justes pour les protéger. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Las aspiraciones de Incendia Chorda me parecen sensatas, pero su forma de llevarlas a cabo... me cuesta encontrarle justificación a la violencia contra quienes deberían poder acudir a los justos en busca de protección».
languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda's aspirations make sense to me, but the way she realises them... I struggle to find justification for violence against people who ought to be able to look to the righteous for protection."

traits.locale_text: «Las aspiraciones de Incendia Chorda me parecen sensatas, pero su forma de llevarlas a cabo... me cuesta encontrarle justificación a la violencia contra quienes deberían poder acudir a los justos en busca de protección».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「インセンディア・チョーダの大志は理解できる、だがそれを実現するやり口は…正義の庇護者を求めるにふさわしい人々に暴力をふるう、そこに正当性を見出すなど、私には容易くできない」
languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda's aspirations make sense to me, but the way she realises them... I struggle to find justification for violence against people who ought to be able to look to the righteous for protection."

traits.locale_text: 「インセンディア・チョーダの大志は理解できる、だがそれを実現するやり口は…正義の庇護者を求めるにふさわしい人々に暴力をふるう、そこに正当性を見出すなど、私には容易くできない」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Incendia Chordas Pläne leuchten mir ein. Doch wie sie sie umsetzt ... Ich kann keine Rechtfertigung für Gewalt gegen Leute finden, die von den Rechtschaffenen eigentlich Schutz erwarten dürften."
languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda's aspirations make sense to me, but the way she realises them... I struggle to find justification for violence against people who ought to be able to look to the righteous for protection."

traits.locale_text: "Incendia Chordas Pläne leuchten mir ein. Doch wie sie sie umsetzt ... Ich kann keine Rechtfertigung für Gewalt gegen Leute finden, die von den Rechtschaffenen eigentlich Schutz erwarten dürften."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda's aspirations make sense to me, but the way she realises them... I struggle to find justification for violence against people who ought to be able to look to the righteous for protection."

languages.text: "İncendia Chorda'nın düşüncelerini mantıklı buluyorum, onları gerçekleştirme şekliyse... Korunmak için erdemli kimselere sığınan insanlara şiddeti kafamda mantıklı bir çerçeveye oturtamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Incendia Chorda's aspirations make sense to me, but the way she realises them... I struggle to find justification for violence against people who ought to be able to look to the righteous for protection."

traits.locale_text: "İncendia Chorda'nın düşüncelerini mantıklı buluyorum ama onları gerçekleştirme şekli... Korunmak için erdemli kişilere sığınan insanlara karşı şiddeti kafamda mantıklı bir çerçeveye oturtamıyorum."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
